title: Hope Shines Through Community Exhibition
deck: An exhibition to celebrate the creativity that has emerged during lockdown.
article:
Friday 6th & Saturday 7th November

10am - 4pm at the Gateway Centre

We would like to invite you to our Community Exhibition to help us celebrate the creativity of our community that has emerged during lockdown, and the hope that helps us through.

Painting, crafts, knitting, sewing, poetry and more...

Walkthrough viewings with all appropriate Covid-precautions taken.
